txt.en: 'We must prepare to leave, I know. Our weapons are now scattered throughout this wood after the skirmish...but did you see her when she fought, [placeholder]? Did you see how deft her blade-work, and the way her hair shone like gold? She was lovely....\n\n'Hm? Oh, yes, the weapons! Will you help me gather them? Our supplies are scarce, and we must make ready to depart.'
'Ah, thank you for returning these, [placeholder]. Did you happen to see your fair friend as you wandered the wood?\n\n'No? A shame....'
After a brief skirmish with the Orcs, the poorly-equipped hunting party of Thinglad wishes to recover their dropped arms.

Spears and arrows loosed in the battle can be found near the Orc battle-site in Thinglad.\n\nYou should collect the fallen weapons for Wynmar to expedite the departure of his hunting party from LÃ³rien territory.
Wynmar is at his camp in the north-west of Thinglad.\n\nYou should bring the weapons you collected to Wynmar.
